CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( ISBLANK( FirstCloseDate__c ), ISBLANK( First_Soft_Credit_Gift_Date__c ), ISBLANK(First_Partial_Soft_Credit_Gift__c)
), NULL, DATE(2998,1,1) - MAX( DATE(2998,1,1) - BLANKVALUE( FirstCloseDate__c , DATE(2998,1,1)), DATE(2998,1,1) - BLANKVALUE( First_Soft_Credit_Gift_Date__c , DATE(2998,1,1)), DATE(2998,1,1) - BLANKVALUE(First_Partial_Soft_Credit_Gift__c, DATE(2998,1,1)) ) )
